title: Not able to load images
body:
I am trying to run the model. However, I am getting the following error:

[amalik@node04 xview-yolov3]$ python train.py 
Namespace(batch_size=8, cfg='cfg/c60_a30symmetric.cfg', epochs=999, img_size=800, resume=False)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 207, in <module>
    main(opt)
  File "train.py", line 49, in main
    dataloader = ListDataset(train_path, batch_size=opt.batch_size, img_size=opt.img_size, targets_path=targets_path)
  File "/home/amalik/OGA/ultralytics/xview-yolov3/utils/datasets.py", line 64, in __init__
    assert self.nB > 0, 'No images found in path %s -- testing' % path
AssertionError: No images found in path ../train_images/train_images -- testing

I am confused, why it could not detect the images.


you can see that I have the images in this particular director
--------------
[amalik@node04 xview-yolov3]$ ls ../train_images/train_images/
